full_title: I Could Sing of Your Love Forever by Delirious
title: I Could Sing of Your Love Forever
title_with_featured: I Could Sing of Your Love Forever
lyrics:
4 ContributorsI Could Sing of Your Love Forever Lyrics[Verse]
Over the mountains and the sea
Your river runs with love for me
And I will open up my heart
And let the Healer set me free
I'm happy to be in the truth
And I will daily lift my hands
For I will always sing of when
Your love came down

[Chorus]
I could sing
I could sing of Your love
Forever
